text: Yemwe abemeye! Muziririjwe kuzungura abagore ku gahato, kandi ntimukabagore (mubabuza kongera gushakwa) kugira ngo mubambure bimwe mu byo mwabahaye; keretse baramutse bakoze icyaha kigaragara (nkâ€™ubusambanyi cyangwa gusuzugura abagabo babo), kandi mujye mubana na bo neza. Nimugira icyo mubanenga (mujye mwihangana), kuko hari ubwo mwakwanga ikintu Allah akaba ari cyo ashyiramo ibyiza byinshi
